suite.name: Api Usuarios Test

test.name: Cenario 29: PATCH Atualizar resource e ID invalido

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=reqres_api, url=https://reqres.in/api, headers={'accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'x-api-key': 'reqres-free-v1'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: PATCH On Session
kw.msg: PATCH Request : url=https://reqres.in/api/users/inexistente path_url=/api/users/inexistente headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'accept': 'application/json', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'x-api-key': 'reqres-free-v1', 'Content-Length': '22'} body=b'{"job": "inexistente"}'

c:\Users\md711\Documents\CompassUOL\CompassUolGeral\RobotFrameWork\.venv\Lib\site-packages\urllib3\connectionpool.py:1097: InsecureRequestWarning: Unverified HTTPS request is being made to host 'reqres.in'. Adding certificate verification is strongly advised. See: https://urllib3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/advanced-usage.html#tls-warnings warnings.warn(
kw.doc: Sends a PATCH request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: Erro: Deveria retornar status code 400 para usuario invalido, porém resulta somente 200.
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
